entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 7:07 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.0°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Visibility: 8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 7.6°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers later in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
